review: It's a great concept, but there needs to be better software or something. Many of the interfaces (Youtube, HBO Go, etc) do not let you jump back 5 seconds or rewind at all or easily pause, etc. And the player jumps from one person's phone to another without warning.

review: The chromecast makes it really easy to stream things from my phone or tablet to the TV in my bedroom. If the bulk of your media watching comes from services with compatible apps, and you don't already have a set top device (or don't want any in that room) this is a perfect solution and works really impressively well.

review: This doesn't seem to be working so well for us when we try to cast live streaming programs.  They freeze up and stutter. Anyone else having that same problem with live streams?
